name: Dimension X-mas
description:
Controls

W, A, S, D and mouse. Use mouse button to hit the ball on close range.

Goal

Knock down all the X-mas gifts with the ball.

Music

Holiday - Julie Byrne

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Julie_Byrne/Live_on_WFMUs_Shrunken_Planet_wit...

Note 

All textures have a maximum 256 by 256 pixels - just like in the good old PS days!
